imdb.title: Inugami-san to Nekoyama-san
imdb.plot: Yachiyo Inugami is a dog-like girl who loves cats, whilst Suzu Nekoyama is a cat-like girl who loves dogs. When the two meet, an instant attraction is formed between the two.

episodes.title: Inugami-san and Nekoyama-san
episodes.plot: Yachiyo Inugami is a dog-like person who loves cats whilst Suzu Nekoyama is a cat-like person who loves dogs. Upon being introduced to each other by their mutual friend, Aki Hiiragi, the two take an instant interest in each other.

episodes.title: Ushiwaka-san and Nezu-san
episodes.plot: Yachiyo gets to know her classmate, Mikine Nezu, who displays a lot of mouse-like tendencies. Later, Mikine takes Yachiyo and Suzu to the biology club to meet her upperclassman, Yukiji Ushikawa, who is much like a cow.

episodes.title: Nekoyama-san and Catnip Tea
episodes.plot: Yachiyo brings in some tea spiked with sake, hoping to make Suzu drink it and become docile and affectionate.

episodes.title: Nekoyama-san and Glasses
episodes.plot: Following an eye exam, Yachiyo and Aki accompany Suzu to a glasses shop to get a new pair of glasses.

episodes.title: Nekoyama-san and Karaoke
episodes.plot: Not wanting Yachiyo to witness her first time doing karaoke, Suzu goes with Mikine for a practice run.

episodes.title: Inugami-san, Nekoyama-san, and a Day Off
episodes.plot: Suzu, on an errand for her sister, Tamaki, ends up encountering Yachiyo, Aki, and Aki's little sisters whilst shopping.

episodes.title: Inugami-san and Sarutobi-san
episodes.plot: The class representative, Sora Sarutobi, has a hard time dealing with Yachiyo's antics.

episodes.title: Nekoyama-san and Torikai-san
episodes.plot: Suzu and Yachiyo meet Sora's childhood friend, Hibari Torikai, who had been absent from school for a while.

episodes.title: Inugami-san and a Lovers' Quarrel
episodes.plot: Yachiyo and Suzu end up fighting with each other.

episodes.title: Nekoyama-san and the Pool Opening
episodes.plot: As the school pool is opened, Suzu is reluctant to get into the water with Yachiyo.

episodes.title: Nekoyama-san and the Sick Day
episodes.plot: Suzu comes down with a cold, which results in her having a curious dream about Yachiyo.

episodes.title: Inugami-san, Nekoyama-san, and the Summer Festival
episodes.plot: The girls go to a summer festival where they watch the fireworks together.

episodes.title: Nekoyama-san and the Hot Spring Vacation
episodes.plot: Aki wins tickets to a hot spring inn and invites Suzu to come along, with Yachiyo deciding to tag along.
